sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.RendererFactory</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Select a type=workflow column renderer.</description>
        <name>RendererFactory</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var RendererFactory = Class.create();
RendererFactory.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
    type: 'RendererFactory'
};

/** 
 * Select renderer for a given table.column ref and row ID
 */
RendererFactory.getRenderer = function(ref, id) {
	if (GlideUtil.isExpressInstance())
		return "express_workflow_renderer";

	return new SNC.WorkflowScriptAPI().getRenderer(current);
};

RendererFactory.getSchedule = function(ref, id) {
	var tableName = ref.split('.');
    if (tableName.length != 2) 
		return '';

	var grCurrent = new GlideRecord(tableName[0]);
	grCurrent.sys_id = id;
	
	var ctx = new Workflow().getRunningFlows( grCurrent, tableName[0] );
	
	if (!ctx.next())
		return'';

	var schedule = ctx.workflow_version.schedule+'';
	return schedule ? schedule : '';
};
	]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>john.maher</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2013-06-13 21:38:20</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>561664001b020100adca1e094f0713d1</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>50</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>RendererFactory</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="System (glidesoft)" source="glidesoft">079c7c036d2220100acb70b3534330b0</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_561664001b020100adca1e094f0713d1</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>cmitchell</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-07-26 16:04:44</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>785</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
